revised_title: Advances in Electron Microscopy Autoradiography Techniques in Biology
tldr: The article discusses recent developments in electron microscopy autoradiography techniques, focusing on their application in biology. The author explains the challenges and limitations of the current system, emphasizing the importance of controlling factors such as section thickness, emulsion layer, and exposure conditions to improve resolution and efficiency. The article also highlights the need for further advancements in emulsion manufacture and electron microscopy techniques to enhance the overall autoradiography process.
